about_the_game: The Tobari and the Night of the Curious Moon Soundtrack features 26 tracks from the game, Tobari and the Night of the Curious Moon. Features music by Yukitsuki Alice (Tracks 1-3, 5-24, 26) and rook (Tracks 4, 25). Available in MP3 and FLAC.
